Now when you use ITunes. they do not stream the movie immediately. They download the movie to you and it can take hours!!!! Roku and amazon fire gives you the movies immediately. I thought my apple box was bad so I stupidly bought another one. Same thing. ITunes movies take forever to download. Im surprised Apple wont include Amazon.....Id recommend a Roku or amazon Fire box. review: I love using AirPlay with my wife's Mac and my iPad. However, I recommend connecting the Apple TV via an Ethernet cable directly to your router. I spoke to an Apple support specialist and he explained that the device you use uses twice the wifi - once to stream what you want to watch and the other to send it to the Apple TV. I've had the sound drop and playback stop, but since I connected with Ethernet, it's been a lot better.
